name: declarative-js-symbols
description: Symbols to extends native js Array and Object prototypes with declarative-js functionality.

scripts.copy: cp package.json target/out/src/package.json && cp readme.md target/out/src/readme.md
scripts.commit:test: git add . && git commit -m "test commit" && git push
scripts.pack:it: npm run commit:test && tsc && npm version patch && npm run copy && cd target/out/src && npm pack
